WeaponTraitDef.label: comfort grip
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon is fitted with a custom-molded, ergonomic handle wrapped in high-quality leather. It feels reassuringly secure in the hand, filling the user with a sense of pride and accomplishment.

WeaponTraitDef.label: grim notches
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon is covered in crude, carved notches, each tallying a life taken by a previous owner. It seems there’s one, and nineteen more of them. The handle feels rough and disturbing to hold, filling the user with a sense of dread and guilt.
